meanings.definition: Unable to be expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: The ineffableness beauty of the sunset left us speechless.
meanings.sent2: Her ineffableness joy at winning the competition was evident in her smile.
meanings.sent3: The ineffableness mystery of the old house kept us guessing for days.
meanings.sent4: The ineffableness power of music can touch our souls in ways nothing else can.
meanings.sent5: The ineffableness charm of the small town made it a favorite destination for tourists.

meanings.sent1: The ineffableness magic of the forest filled us with wonder.
meanings.sent2: The ineffableness beauty of the starry night sky took our breath away.
meanings.sent3: The ineffableness taste of the exotic fruit left us craving for more.
meanings.sent4: The ineffableness silence of the desert was both eerie and calming.
meanings.sent5: The ineffableness vastness of the ocean reminded us of our insignificance in the world.
